text: what seems to be Sunny's biggest fear when it comes to both Lena and Quinn?
answer: She is afraid they will leave her.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: who is waiting for Sunny at her house when she returns from surfing in the rain, and what do they want Sunny to do with them?
answer: Quinn is waiting for her and wants to know if she wants to dye their hair together.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: who is Sunny surprised to meet when she finds Lena's house in the middle of the night?
answer: She meets a tall, thin man with brown skin and dark hair going in every direction who introduces himself as Janesh.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Quinn show Sunny when she stops by to visit her after she is home from the hospital because she had a panic attack?
answer: She shows Sunny the message in the bottle that Sunny dropped in the water with a poem written inside for the person who donated their heart to Sunny, as well as numerous other poems Sunny had written and Quinn had found.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: why does Sunny say she is going to die in opening pages of the story?
answer: She is getting a heart transplant so technically she argues she'll be dead at least for a few minutes.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what do the letters FBF stand for?
answer: FBF stands for "former best friend."
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: who does Kate tell about Sunny's heart transplant, and what is their connection to Sunny?
answer: Kate called Suzette, who is the mother of Margot Banks, Sunny's former best friend.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what’s the first and last name of Sunny’s FBF, or Former Best Friend?
answer: Margot Banks
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is the name of the island where the story takes place, and in which state is the island located?
answer: Juniper Island, South Carolina
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what game do Sunny and Margot play to test Kate's neat freak tendencies?
answer: They move an object in the house to see how long it would take Kate to notice.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is the longest Kate ever went to notice an object that Sunny and Margot had moved in the house?
answer: 47 minutes
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is Sunny St. James' heart condition called?
answer: Cardiomyopathy
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: how old is Sunny when she learns about her heart condtion, and how long has she been sick?
answer: She was 10 when she got sick and she has been sick for two years.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is the medical name of Sunny’s heart diagnosis?
answer: Cardiomyopathy
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what two emotions is Sunny feeling right before she has her surgery?
answer: She is scared and excited.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: name at least two reasons Sunny says she doesn't want to die?
answer: Possible answers include she wants to turn 13, or she wants to step inside Juniper Island Middle School, she wants to do amazing things such as bungee jumping or sky diving or water skiing, she wants a best friend again, and she really, really wants to kiss a boy.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what physical "ailment" does Sunny say she has because she wants to kiss a boy so badly?
answer: She said her lips itch all the time.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: name the two boys that Margot has already kissed.
answer: Sam Blanchard, Henry Lee
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: who is Dave?
answer: Dave is Kate's best friend since high school and a musician.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: name at least two ways Sunny describes Dave.
answer: Possible answers include Kate's best friend, a musician, everyone's favorite person ever, muscular arms, curly black hair, dark brown skin, wears plaid shirts and black framed glasses 365, cute even though he's about a million years old and she thinks he loves Kate.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: where was Sunny born?
answer: Nashville
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what was Sunny's dad's name and what happened to him?
answer: His name was Ethan and he died in a motorcycle accident right after Sunny was born.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is Kate's bookstore on Juniper Island called?
answer: Cherry Picked Books
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is Kate's relationship to Sunny, and why is she taking care of her?
answer: Kate was best friends with Sunny's mom, Lena, whom couldn't take care of Sunny anymore, and gave her to Kate when Sunny was 4 years old.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is Sunny's doctor's name?
answer: Dr. Ahmed
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what was Sunny told the only thing that would save her a year and a half earlier?
answer: She was told that the only thing that would help her is a heart transplant.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what was Sunny eating when she received a call that a heart was available for her transplant?
answer: She was eating a grilled cheese sandwich.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what gesture does Sunny make toward Kate as she is being wheeled away fro surgery?
answer: She holds up her pinky.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: who does Sunny "see" while she is under anesthesia during her heart transplant?
answer: She envisions her mom as a mermaid.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Sunny have in her nightstand at home that she looks at every night?
answer: She has a picture of her mom in her nightstand.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: why has Sunny created a story in her mind that her birth mom is a mermaid?
answer: It is her child-like way of explaining why her mom had to leave her, that she didn't know what to do with a two-legged human girl who needed air, so she left her on land with Kate, which would be a better fit.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what facial feature does Sunny notice about her mom when she "sees" her during her surgery?
answer: She notices her mom's freckles for the first time.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what situation adds to Sunny's confusion as she is waking up from her surgery?
answer: She thinks her "mermaid" is there, which means both Kate and Lena, her birth mother, are present.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does the nurse do to help calm Sunny down as she is awaking from surgery?
answer: She jabs a needle into the tube in her arm, presumably a medication, because she said it feels as if heat spreads across her chest.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: who had Kate allowed to visit Sunny in the hospital for 10 minutes as she was coming out of surgery?
answer: Her mother, Lena
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is the name of the hospital where Sunny gets her heart transplant?
answer: Port Hope Children’s Hospital
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: What does Sunny say she dreamed about while in the hospital?
answer: Mermaids
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: about a week after receiving her hew heart, what does Sunny wonder about her heart donor?
answer: She wonders what their name was and if they ever got to kiss anyone (she assumes her new heart belonged to a kid since she is a kid).
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is the fear following an organ transplant, and what do actions do doctors take to try to combat it?
answer: The fear is organ rejection, which can result in death, so Sunny has to take a lot of medications and stay in the hospital.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what flavor of pudding does Sunny enjoy in the hospital?
answer: Butterscotch
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what was the name of Dave’s rock band before they broke up?
answer: Truth Lies Low
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what is the name of Kate’s bookstore?
answer: Cherry Picked Books
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: What band does Sunny like?
answer: Truth Lies Low
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: since her heart transplant, how has Sunny's view of Dave's music changed?
answer: She used to hate it (even calling it "Whiny boy music"), but now she loves it.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: why does Sunny want to kiss someone so bad in relation to music?
answer: She believes that love and kissing inspires the greatest songs and poems and books.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: three weeks after her surgery, Sunny has an unexpected visitor in the hospital. Who does she think is visiting, and who is actually there to visit?
answer: She thinks her former best friend, Margot, is going to be there, but it is her mother, Lena.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: name two ways Sunny describes Lena when she sees her for the first time in the hospital (while she is fully conscious).
answer: Possible answers include torn jeans, black stomping boots, slouch black band shirt, black hair, purple eye makeup and lipstick, and a bunch of tattoos.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: when Sunny was in 1st grade, what important question did she ask Kate, and what was Kate's response?
answer: She asked Kate if she could call her "Mom," and Kate told her "no" because she has a mom.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what "illness" does Kate reveal to Sunny that Sunny's mom, Lena, suffers from?
answer: Lena is an alcoholic.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: though Sunny knows why her mom left her with Kate, what does she still want to know?
answer: She wants to know why her mom didn't call, write or visit for 8 years.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: how does Sunny physically respond to her mother, Lena, showing up in her hospital room?
answer: Sunny turns her back to her.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Sunny do with all the feelings she has upon seeing her mom for the first time in 8 years?
answer: She writes her feelings in a song.

text: What does Sunny call her plan?
answer: "New Life"
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what are the three steps to Sunny's new life plan?
answer: These are her exact responses, but paraphrasing is fine. 1. Do awesome amazing things I could never do before. 2. Find a new best friend. 3. Find a boy and kiss him.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: name two of the three parts of Sunny’s 'New Life' plan.
answer: Do awesome amazing things I could never do before, Find a new best friend, Find a boy and kiss him
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Sunny have wrapped up in her towel and hidden from Kate that she takes down to the water the first time she goes to the beach following her transplant?

book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what color did Margot, Sunny's former best friend, dye her hair?
answer: She dyed it a (natural looking) shade of red.

text: what color does Quinn suggest that Sunny dyes her hair?
answer: Quinn suggests she dye it blue, or more specifically, aquamarine.

text: what is Quinn concerned about with Sunny as they start to swim toward the shore during their first meeting?
answer: She is concerned about how tired Sunny is from swimming.

text: what does Sunny claim she'll be able to do in a week in relation to Quinn?

text: where are Quinn’s grandparents from?

text: what does Sunny like about meeting Quinn for the first time, in comparison to people in her hometown?

text: What is Quinn's mom's job?

text: what does Quinn ask Sunny to do with her later in the evening on the day they meet?

text: which continent is the only one Quinn hasn’t traveled to?

text: what is the name of the shell Quinn asks Sunny to help her find, and what does it look like?

text: how did Kate end up with a house that used to be real lighthouse?

text: what is the nickname Sunny uses for her bedroom?

text: what happens when Sunny looks at the picture of Lena each night?

text: what two animals does Quinn say are the coolest animals her mom has ever photographed?

text: where does Quinn say is the coolest place she has lived?

text: who is waiting for Sunny when she finally arrives home from beach movie, and who is not home?

text: which two types of woods is Dave's guitar made from?

answer: They go surfing.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what happens between Sunny and Lena that makes Sunny feel like there is a hummingbird fluttering around in her chest?
answer: It is the first time she and her mom have held hands (that she remembers).
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: why is Sunny hesitant about surfing the first time she is surfing with her own new board?
answer: It is stormy and she notices how rough the ocean looks, which makes her nervous.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what type of injury does Sunny get while surfing on her new board in the storm?
answer: She cuts her arm from her elbow to her wrist on a rock.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: how does Sunny get hurt surfing?
answer: She cuts her arm on a rock
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: which colors do Quinn and Sunny dye their hair?
answer: Quinn dyes her hair lavender, while Sunny dyes her hair aquamarine.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: What color does Sunny dye her hair?
answer: Aquamarine / blue
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: What is Quinn's full name?
answer: Quinn Rios Rivera
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: after Kate essentially grounds Sunny when she lies about going surfing with Lena, gets hurt and dyes her hair, what surprising thing does Sunny see when she goes downstairs to talk to Kate?
answer: She sees that Dave is with Kate and that they are kissing while sitting on the couch.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: how does Sunny feel after she sees Dave and Kate kissing?
answer: Sunny is surprised she doesn't feel happy because she is afraid she is missing out (she feels lonely or left out).
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what happens to Sunny as she goes to her bedroom window Quinn is tapping?
answer: She gets her feet tangled in her curtains and falls down.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what happens when Sunny tries to kiss Quinn in bedroom the night Quinn comes to her window?
answer: Quinn pulls away, says she is sorry and then leaves Sunny's house.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what extra sense does Kate have?
answer: Sixth sunny sense to alert her to a daring escape
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: where does Sunny go in the middle of the night after Quinn leaves her house?
answer: She leaves on bike from her house to find Lena's house so she can talk to her about all her feelings.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what sound does Sunny hear inside Lena's house right after meeting Janesh outside?
answer: She hears a baby crying.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what information does Sunny gather by eavesdropping on and watching the conversation between Janesh and Lena?
answer: She learns that Janesh and Lena are married and they have a baby daughter named Samaira (and Janesh and Samaira are living with Lena in Port Hope, but Lena hadn't told her any of this information yet).
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: What is the name of Sunny's sister?
answer: Samaira
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: even though Sunny is sad after feeling rejected by both Lena and Quinn, name at least one way she is still recognizing beauty in her life.
answer: Possible answers include sitting on a surfboard in the calm water while the morning sun streaks the sky orange and pink, OR listening to Dave's super whiny songs and eating butterscotch pudding, OR dreaming about kissing and love and best friends, OR Kate's hand on her back, sure and steady.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: in addition to Quinn and girls, Sunny also reveals to Kate that she might like whom?
answer: She admits she might like boys as well as girls.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Sunny reveal to readers about Kate, even if she doesn't say it?
answer: Sunny realizes that Kate is her mom (even if she doesn't call her that, it is still true).
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Lena say is obvious about Quinn?
answer: Lena says it is obvious that Sunny likes Quinn (and that Quinn likes her, too).
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Lena tell Sunny in relation to her feelings about Quinn?
answer: Lena tells her that it is ok to like Quinn, to like anyone she wants to (despite what others think).
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what surprising request does Sunny make to Kate when they are driving home from meeting up with Lena the first time after learning about Janesh and Samaira?
answer: She asks Kate to stop at Margot's and she leaves a poem for her, essentially as a goodbye.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: what does Sunny finally do while Dave is singing the whiny kissing song to her?
answer: Sunny finally reads the letter Quinn left for her.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James

text: name two things Quinn says to Sunny in her letter?
answer: Possible answers include the following: She is sorry, she is scared that someone might actually like her back, she might have to move away, Sunny might like someone else better (including boys), people might make fun of them, she wonders if they can be scared together (because she wants to be brave like Sunny), she asks her to meet her at the 4th of July bonfire, says they can still be BFFS no matter what, and that her mom got a job at the aquarium.
book_title: The Mighty Heart of Sunny St. James
